text:
He lay in darkness. Thoughts swarmed in his mind. 

He couldn't catch one. 

Fearful cries pierced the night. 

“Not again,” he whispered. 

He remained still. 

Morning light crept in. 

He felt dazed, lost in oblivion. 

The world outside stirred. 

He heard the screams again. 

“Why can’t I escape?” he thought. 

Silence followed, heavy and thick. 

He lay there, waiting.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist is overwhelmed by chaotic thoughts and feelings of despair as he lies in his room, oblivious to the passage of time.
